section.title: Issue titles
section.p: As a user I want to make a preview with the AI response from chat
Make AI Positron platform compatible with a custom Microsoft Azure OpenAI service
Add an action for presenting usage-status
As a user, I want to switch between chat branches, so I can inspect and continue a flow

section.title: Release notes
section.p: Oxygen AI Positron 0.9.4 release. Oxygen AI Positron service uses the OpenAI platform to help technical documentation writers with features like document generation, change suggestions, and translation capabilities. The service is accessed from within Oxygen XML Editor though the AI Positron Assistant add-on.
